argSrc: Supermarkets and shopping centres should be allowed to open on any Sundays and holidays.
argTrg: This may be a change for the employees that cannot to be implemented easily.

argSrc: Supermarkets and shopping centres should be allowed to open on any Sundays and holidays.
argTrg: However, especially for working customers this would mean greater flexibility and fewer nerve-racking peak times during the week.
